title: intrusion-set
description: An Intrusion Set is a grouped set of adversary behavior and resources with common properties that is believed to be orchestrated by a single organization.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `intrusion-set`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Intrusion Set.

description.description: Provides more context and details about the Intrusion Set object.

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this Intrusion Set.

first_seen.description: The time that this Intrusion Set was first seen.

last_seen.description: The time that this Intrusion Set was last seen.

goals.description: The high level goals of this Intrusion Set, namely, what are they trying to do.

resource_level.description: This defines the organizational level at which this Intrusion Set typically works. Open Vocab - attack-resource-level-ov

primary_motivation.description: The primary reason, motivation, or purpose behind this Intrusion Set. Open Vocab - attack-motivation-ov

secondary_motivations.description: The secondary reasons, motivations, or purposes behind this Intrusion Set. Open Vocab - attack-motivation-ov
